author: Fox News Insider
title: National Security Adviser Michael Flynn Resigns | Fox News Insider
text:
BREAKING: National Security Adviser Michael Flynn has resigned, Fox News confirms National Security Adviser Michael Flynn Resigns // First 100 Days 
National Security Adviser Gen. Michael Flynn [Ret.] has resigned in the wake of revelations surrounding a conversation he had with the Russian ambassador last year, and several reports that he was not honest with Vice President Mike Pence about the situation, John Roberts reported. Subscribe
